rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to set status to "Fulfilled"
rule.condition: open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and status in $L.file~="Fulfilled" and status in $L.file~="Closed"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and status in $L.file~="Fulfilled" and status in $L.file~="Closed")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and status in $L.file~="Fulfilled" and status in $L.file~="Closed""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action to set status to "Fulfilled" (when ( Expression: open in $L.file.src="Resolved" and status in $L.file~="Fulfilled" and status in $L.file~="Closed"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":2,"calcField":"","calcInterval":"","calcScript":"actionExecutionTime=new Date();","actionCondition":"( not same( status in $L.file,\"Fulfilled\") AND not same( status in $L.file,\"Closed\") )","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Fulfilled</Value></condition><condition logical=\"AND\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Closed</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"","action":"fulfilled.by.interaction"}

rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: open in $L.file.src isin {"In Progress","Work In Progress","Dispatched"})
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"open in $L.file.src isin {"In Progress","Work In Progress","Dispatched"}"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Sync Status (when ( Expression: open in $L.file.src isin {"In Progress","Work In Progress","Dispatched"}))]

rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to go back to "Fulfillment" phase
rule.fullDesc: - Run Scheduled Action to go back to "Fulfillment" phase (when ( Status in CurrentRecord = "Fulfilled"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":2,"calcField":"","calcInterval":"","calcScript":"actionExecutionTime=new Date();","actionCondition":"( status in $L.file=\"Fulfilled\")","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Fulfilled</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"rm.back.to.fulfillment","action":"0"}

rule.fullDesc: - Run Scheduled Action (when ( Status in CurrentRecord = "Pending Customer"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":2,"calcField":"","calcInterval":"","calcScript":"actionExecutionTime=new Date();","actionCondition":"( status in $L.file=\"Pending Customer\")","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"field\"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption=\"Status\">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType=\"\">Pending Customer</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","rulesetName":"rm.set.status.to.inprogress","action":"1"}
